then.line: Hmmm...
Hot wax should seal this sandwich up right!
Hot wax, huh? Welll...
Submarines do need to be waterproof! Let's do it.
Yesss! That's everything, right?
Yep! Lemme just drip this right on and.... Okay!
Let's see what we've got!
Let's have guava jelly! A taste of the islands for Minty!
Ha! Jamaican me hungry with your condiment selection!
You get it? Jamaica's an island.
So. Figured that might be a fun joke to make.
It was! I liked it.
Great! So I guess we're wrappin' up this sandwich, huh?
Let's see what we got.
Hmmm...
I say-o, gimme that mayo! Minty's gonna love it!
She's got good taste, that little dog! I love mayo. It's so versatile!
What else can you use it for?
Well, let's see...
You got sandwiches. You can dip fries in it. Goes great on elote!
There's deviled eggs. Potato salad. Spread it on the outside of a grilled cheese...
Wow! Those are a lot of uses.
Yeah! There's lots you can do with mayo. It's, uh, not particularly funny, but...
Sometimes it's just about conveyin' information, you know?
I do! Thanks, Doc!
No problem! Let's take a look at your sandwich!
